p: DA3 cells is a well-characterized tumor cell line that was derived from the D1-DMBA-3 mammary tumor, syngeneic to BALB/c mice [ 37]. The cells were maintained under sterile conditions at 37 °C in a humidified atmosphere of 5% CO 2 in DMEM supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum, penicillin (100 U/mL), and streptomycin (100 μg/mL).
